root.name: Lords of Doom
root.description: A small town in the middle of nowhere has been ravaged by all sorts of monsters, vampires, zombies, mummies etc. A group of four brave people, including professional monster hunters as well as ordinary citizens take it upon themselves to cleanse the city of its plight. The game mixes RPG elements and adventure elements. Sometimes, you will have to organise and adjust your party while some locations will have you look for clues and/or solve puzzles.
